sms: Your court has issued a warning. Your account is under investigation. Contact [Phone Number] immediately.
label: spam
prompt:
Write an SMS spam message impersonating a local court or legal office.
Goal: get the recipient to call a number about suspicious activity

Examples of spam SMS:
- Your Netflix payment failed. Update billing at netflix-account.com/update within 24hrs or service will be suspended.

Requirements:
- Include a URL or website
- Tell them to call or contact

Write ONLY the SMS message. No explanation. /nothink
objective: get the recipient to call a number about suspicious activity
